name: Love For You
content: Now would you stop me if I'm right
如果我是对的你会不会阻止我
I think about it every night
我从一开始就引领潮流
I've been unselfish with my heart
我对自己的真心从不自私
And if I've been around the world
遇见了无数不同的女孩
If you were born in the eighties
如果你是八十年代出生的
